src:
Jadwal Liga 1 Senin Ini: Persela Lamongan vs Barito Putera
03 Nov 2019, 22:05 by Tempo.co, Aditya Budiman
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Liga 1 Indonesia sudah memasuki pekan ke-27. Sepanjang pekan ini sejumlah laga akan tersaji. Salah satunya ialah Persela Lamongan melawan Barito Putera.
Pertandingan kedua kesebelasan menjadi pembuka Liga 1 Indonesia pekan ke-27. Persaingan tim-tim semakin sengit, terutama di papan atas dan papan bawah.
Pertemuan antara Persela dengan Barito Putra diprediksi berjalan ketat. Bagi Persela kemenangan amat penting untuk membawa keluar dari zona degradasi. Sementara bagi Barito meraih poin di laga nanti juga sama pentingnya selain agar menjauh dari degradasi juga untuk menembus 10 besar.
Saat ini Persela yang dilatih Nil Maizar ada di peringkat 16 klasemen Liga 1 Indonesia dengan 24 poin. Sedangkan Barito duduk di posisi ke-12 dengan 29 angka.

Jadwal Liga 1 Indonesia Senin, 4 November 2019

Persela Lamongan vs Barito Putera, Gelora Surajaya, Pukul 18:30 WIB (O Channel)

LIGA INDONESIA
text:
League 1 Schedule This Monday: Persela Lamongan vs Barito Putera
03 Nov 2019, 22:05 by Tempo.co, Aditya Budiman
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - League 1 of Indonesia has entered its 27th week. During this week a number of games will be presented. One of them is Persela Lamongan against Barito Putera.
The second match of the teams became the opening of Indonesian League 1 Week 27. Team competition is increasingly fierce, especially at the top and bottom boards.
The meeting between Persela and Barito Putra is predicted to run tight. For Persela victory is very important to bring out of the relegation zone. As for Barito, getting points in the match will be just as important as in addition to moving away from relegation as well as breaking into the top 10.
Currently Persela who trained by Nil Maizar is ranked 16 in the Indonesian League 1 standings with 24 points. While Barito sat in 12th position with 29 points.

Indonesia League 1 Schedule Monday, 4 November 2019

Persela Lamongan vs Barito Putera, Gelora Surajaya, At 18:30 WIB (O Channel)

INDONESIA LIGA
